name: Black Hole 3D (Commodore 64)
description:
BLACK HOLE 3D

Black Hole 3D (Commodore 64) was our first game, developed in 2017 for the compo "Spanish seuck compo y olé" . Now a few years later we relaunch it with some improvements. 

Black Hole 3D ”, a game made with S.e.u.c.k. classic, but with a twist, because you can use 3D glasses (red / blue) to play and enjoy the experience more.

It is a small tribute to one of Disney's science fiction films, "The Black Hole" from 1979. 

ARGUMENT

Year 2130. After a year and a half of space exploration, the "Palomino" ship heads to Earth, but on its way it detects another ship, the "Cygnus" next to a black hole, in an area that it should not be able to. be by the laws of physics. Before continuing, we will have to explore this strange phenomenon and see what happens. For this, one of the most advanced exploration robots will be in charge of entering the ship to find out what is happening. You are that robot: "V.I.C.- CENT". (Note: The original name is “V.I.N.CENT”, but for a Commodorian, calling it VIC is better). 

PHASES

Phase 1 - "Assault":

You will have to travel through outer space from the "Palomino" to the "Cygnus", avoiding the dangers of it to reach your goal. Meteorites, space traps, support ships, defense robots, etc. They will be in charge of preventing you from entering it. If you succeed, you will be closer to your goal.

Phase 2 - “Cygnus” (Special phase for 3D glasses):

Strange and enigmatic, but packed with defenses to ward off invaders. Will you be able to go through it to see what lies beyond?

Phase 3 - “Black Hole” (Special phase for 3D glasses):

Everything has become chaotic, you have to get out of the Cygnus, but the only way out is the path you are traveling, it goes straight to the black hole. You have to escape their attraction and get to safety!

Observations:

Lives: 4 / Extra Life: 10,000 points.
